section.name: Introduction
section.p: The NeuClear Payment Processor provides a simple abstraction for executing book entry Payment transactions on the NeuClear clearing platform.
A fully functional implementation of the PaymentProcessor is implemented based on the NeuClear Ledger API.

Implementations based on other backends should be simple to create. If you wish to implement it ontop of an existing SQL ledger. We recommend extending the NeuClear Ledger instead of writing a completely new Payment Processor.
